itinerary.mapNote: Night hut at 8th Station. Dawn summit attempt. 3250m.
Summit Kengamine 3776m at dawn. Descend 5th Station, bus to town. 860m.

waypoints.name: Fujisan Summit (Kengamine)
waypoints.note: Japan's highest peak. Sacred volcano. Sunrise (goraiko) pilgrimage.

waypoints.name: Yoshida 5th Station
waypoints.note: Main trailhead. Buses from Tokyo and Kawaguchiko.

waypoints.name: Crater Rim Walk (Ohachi)
waypoints.note: Circumnavigate the summit crater. 3km circuit. Highest shrine.

waypoints.name: Kawaguchiko Lake
waypoints.note: Famous Fuji reflection lake. Best photography from north shore.
